stoic1.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
stoic1.author: Marcus Aurelius

stoic2.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
stoic2.author: Marcus Aurelius

stoic3.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
stoic3.author: Marcus Aurelius
